title: Trigonometric Functions - Rewriting and Solving - Part A

content.question: Part A The functions <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>g</mn> </math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>h</mn> </math> are given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <mi>sec</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>csc</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46D4@</annotation> </semantics> </math> <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <mi>sin</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47A6@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (i) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadEgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1A@</annotation> </semantics> </math> as an expression involving only one trigonometric function. (ii) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadIgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1B@</annotation> </semantics> </math> as an expression involving only one trigonometric function.

frqParts.text: Part A The functions <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>g</mn> </math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mn>h</mn> </math> are given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <mi>sec</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>csc</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46D4@</annotation> </semantics> </math> <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <mi>sin</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47A6@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (i) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>g</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadEgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1A@</annotation> </semantics> </math> as an expression involving only one trigonometric function. (ii) Rewrite <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>h</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadIgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1B@</annotation> </semantics> </math> as an expression involving only one trigonometric function.

topic.text: 3.11: The Secant, Cosecant, and Cotangent Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
